name: SpaceShooter Mini Game
description:
Move the character with W,A,S,D or arrow keys. Shoot with left and right click.

Shoot as many enemys as possible before you get killed.

Left mouse shoots a normal shot and right mouse click shoots a homing missle, which targets an random enemy. The player does not get damage when an enemy passes, to make the game a little bit more fun :)
It is also intended that the enemies can shoot through asteroids, they only should hit you :)
When more missles explode: then their target is dead and there is no enemy available. This is intended.

If the missles are stuck, try waiting with shooting after spawning, you might overwhelm it in the beginning ;)
